text: Piper Perabo (born October 31, 1976) is an American actress. She acts in movies, television and on stage. In the movie Whiteboyz, she played Sara. She played Violet "Jersey" Sanford in Coyote Ugly. Perabo was born in Dallas, Texas. She grew up in Toms River, New Jersey. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Dallas Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Piper Perabo
